description: INTUS terminals are used for timecard management (i.e., employees clocking in and out), security access control, diagnostics, and data collection.

NOTE: Only newer INTUS terminal models (i.e., INTUS 5500 and 5600) can use IKF files and the RemoteConf software for updates. Older INTUS terminals, including the INTUS 3100, 3450, and 5300, are managed with INTUS RemoteSetup, the predecessor to RemoteConf.
